TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridRow extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 表示一个 行。

span.span: Represents a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A行表示绑定的数据源中的单个数据项。A row represents a single data item in a bound data source. 每一行都包含每个列中的一个单元格，并在绑定的数据项中的每个单元格显示单个值。Each row contains one cell per column in the , and each cell displays a single value in the bound data item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交替行是可以向其分配不同的特征，如交替的背景色的行。Alternating rows are rows to which you can assign different characteristics, such as alternating background colors. 你可以设置属性以指示的交替行集中的行数。You can set the property of the to indicate the number of rows within a set of alternating rows. 有关交替行的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about alternating rows, see . 重写响应的方法更改为属性。Override the method to respond to changes to the property. 属性不具有其自己的属性更改方法，因为字段重复使用只读的字段。The property does not have its own property changed method because the field reuses the read-only field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPropertyChanged(valuetype System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnPropertyChanged (e As DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 描述已更改的属性的事件数据（包括旧值和新值）。

span.span: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.

summary.span: 每当更新此 上任何依赖项属性的有效值时调用。

span.span: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this has been updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 将在自变量参数中报告已更改的特定依赖属性。The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter. 重写此方法以对更改作出响应属性。Override this method to respond to changes to the property. 属性不具有其自己的属性更改方法，因为字段重复使用只读的字段。The property does not have its own property changed method because the field reuses the read-only field.

para.span: 始终与第一个操作实现中调用基实现。

span.span: Always call the base implementation as the first operation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果不这样做将显著禁用整个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统，这会导致不正确的值进行报告。

span.span: Failure to do this will significantly disable the entire [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, which causes incorrect values to be reported.

para.span: 特定于实现也是负责维护的正确状态属性，它会影响可见的用户界面并使无效在适当的时间基于属性值更改的可视化树。

span.span: The specific implementation is also responsible for maintaining the correct state for the property, which affects the visible user interface and invalidates the visual tree based on property value changes at appropriate times.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSelected(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSelected (e As RoutedEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 事件数据，由 调用此方法时为空。

span.span: The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the .

summary.span: 在 属性值更改为 时引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the property value changes to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
